turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order some pizzas from Bella Luna for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sounds great. what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get two small thick-crust pizzas? One with chicken and bacon and the other with pepperoni and chobbies and black olives, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. your order for 2 small thick crust pizzas, 1 with chicken and bacon, and 1 with pepperoni, anchovies, and black olives comes out to $24.55.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've submitted your order, it'll be ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need assistance with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will be all. Thank you.
